titles.title: Agricultural Export Expansion Act of 2015
A bill to allow the financing by United States persons of sales of agricultural commodities to Cuba.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary:
4/22/2015--Introduced. Agricultural Export Expansion Act of 2015
This bill amends the Trade Sanctions Reform and Export Enhancement Act of 2000 to permit a person subject to the jurisdiction of the United States to provide payment or financing for sales of agricultural commodities to Cuba or to an individual or entity in Cuba.
